definition: letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China

sentences.english: He finally rummaged out her reply in the middle drawer of his desk.
sentences.chinese: 他最后从写字台中间抽屉里翻找出她的复信。

sentences.english: He left it on my desk yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 他昨天放在我的写字台上了。

sentences.english: Decided not to bid on the roll-top desk.
sentences.chinese: 决定不投标那张顶盖可卷缩的写字台。

sentences.english: The desk will fit nicely in that recess.
sentences.chinese: 这张写字台正好可以放进那个壁凹内。

sentences.english: One King bed. Working desk with wired (high-speed) Internet access.
sentences.chinese: 写字台配有高速有线宽带上网设施。

sentences.english: There are my keyboard on the desk, and I often read the book.
sentences.chinese: 写字台上放着我的电子琴，还有我平时常看的书。

sentences.english: Long hours at the desk can cause musculoskeletal problems and hand problems.
sentences.chinese: 长时间伏案于写字台会引起肌骨骼和手部疾病。

sentences.english: He rifled every drawer of my desk.
sentences.chinese: 他把我的写字台的每个抽屉里的东西都偷走了。

sentences.english: One remembered where there used to be a picture or a carpet, or a secretaire.
sentences.chinese: 有人记得那里曾经有一张图画或挂毯，或写字台。

sentences.english: Furniture: Wooden furniture , wooden floor , cloth sofa.
sentences.chinese: 只，写字台一张，布艺沙发，实木地板。

sentences.english: I had no writing desk before. I did my homework on a .
sentences.chinese: 以前我没有写字台，我总是在一条长凳上写作业。

sentences.english: My father sits at his desk writing his book year in and year out.
sentences.chinese: 我父亲一年到头总坐在写字台旁写他的书。

sentences.english: He rustled the papers on his writing desk.
sentences.chinese: 他把写字台上的文件弄得沙沙作响。
那个写字台是玻璃面的。

sentences.english: She flattened out the crumpled letter on the desk.
sentences.chinese: 她在写字台上把皱巴巴的信展平。

sentences.english: Why is a raven like a writing-desk?
sentences.chinese: 为什么乌鸦像一张写字台？

definition: small side table/coffee table/teapoy (ornamental tripod with caddies for tea)
three-drawer desk (traditional Chinese piece of furniture)
sofa (loanword)/CL:條|条[tiao2],張|张[zhang1]/(Internet slang) the first reply or replier to a forum post
